title: Tamil Nadu woman arrested for dowry harassment
description: A woman in Tamil Nadu was arrested regarding a dowry harassment case, highlighting legal enforcement against dowry-related crimes.

title: Bihar floods Death toll rises to 25
description: Bihar endured severe floods leading to a death toll of 25 people, emphasizing the ongoing natural disaster and relief efforts.

title: Cyclone Gati hits Odisha coast
description: Cyclone Gati made landfall on the Odisha coast causing significant damage and disruption, with warnings and evacuations underway.

title: Delhi Metro to extend routes to Dwarka
description: Delhi Metro plans to extend its routes to Dwarka, enhancing urban transport infrastructure in the capital.

title: Bengaluru traffic congestion worsens
description: Traffic congestion in Bengaluru has escalated, affecting daily commutes and quality of urban life.

title: Kerala government announces free bus rides
description: Kerala state government launched a program offering free bus rides to support public transport users.

title: Hyderabad police bust drug racket
description: Law enforcement in Hyderabad successfully dismantled a major drug trafficking network.

title: Mumbai local train services resume
description: Mumbai's vital local train services have resumed, providing relief to millions of commuters.

title: Jaipur hosts International Literature Festival
description: Jaipur hosted a prestigious literary festival attracting authors and visitors from across the world.

title: Assam CM inaugurates new hospital
description: The Chief Minister of Assam inaugurated a new hospital to improve healthcare access in Guwahati.

title: Lucknow airport expansion plan approved
description: Expansion of Lucknow airport has been approved, aiming to boost connectivity and economic growth.

title: Kolkata weather update Heavy rainfall
description: Heavy rainfall warnings have been issued for Kolkata, with possible disruptions expected.

title: Goa government relaxes beach restrictions
description: Goa government eased beach access rules to encourage tourism while maintaining safety measures.

title: Chandigarh city council elections results
description: Results of Chandigarh city council elections were declared with various political parties securing seats.

title: Patna university students protest
description: Students at Patna University held protests related to academic and social issues.

title: Srinagar valley receives snowfall
description: The Srinagar valley experienced early snowfall marking the onset of the winter season.

title: Amritsar Golden Temple hosts festival
description: The Golden Temple in Amritsar hosted a significant festival attracting devotees from across India.
